newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.Africa's JSE sets new record for shares traded.
newsitem.headline: S.Africa's JSE sets new record for shares traded.

text.p: South Africa's Johannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE) said on Friday that it had set a new record for the number of shares traded in one week with 53,796 deals covering a volume of 471.03 million shares.
The previous high was 52,142 trades in the week ended June 13 and the previous highest volume was 464.46 million shares in the week ended February 14.
